name: G-Fish
description:
G-Fish is an action game for Windows.
Your object is to beat all enemies.
When you touch the enemies your power decreases.
Once you are out of power, the game is over.

Controls(keyboard or joystick)
Arrow keys(Joystick).... Move
[Z](A Button)....... Start/Attack
[ESC]............... Quit

If would like to support my works, please consider backing me on patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/pigmhall
